languages.text: "Он назвал вас упыр{mf|ем|ицей}, восседающ{mf|им|ей} на троне из костей и жрущ{mf|им|ей} сырое мясо своих слуг... Простите, Ваша Светлость! Мне тошно от мерзости этих поганых слов!"

"He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"
languages.original_text: "Он назвал вас упыр{mf|ем|ицей}, восседающ{mf|им|ей} на троне из костей и жрущ{mf|им|ей} сырое мясо своих слуг... Простите, Ваша Светлость! Мне тошно от мерзости этих поганых слов!"

traits.locale_text: He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, simply repeating these foul words is making me sick!

"He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"

"He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"

languages.text: "Er nannte Euch einen Ghul auf einem Knochenthron, der das rohe Fleisch seiner Diener verschlingt ... Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Allein das Wiederholen dieser schmutzigen Worte bereitet mir Übelkeit!"
languages.original_text: "He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"

traits.locale_text: "Er nannte Euch einen Ghul auf einem Knochenthron, der das rohe Fleisch seiner Diener verschlingt ... Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Allein das Wiederholen dieser schmutzigen Worte bereitet mir Übelkeit!"

languages.text: «Dijo que era un espantajo que se sentaba en un trono de huesos y devoraba la carne cruda de sus siervos... Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Se me revuelve el estómago de solo repetir aquellas reprobables injurias!».
languages.original_text: "He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"

traits.locale_text: «Dijo que era un espantajo que se sentaba en un trono de huesos y devoraba la carne cruda de sus siervos... Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Se me revuelve el estómago de solo repetir aquellas reprobables injurias!».

languages.text: 「奴はあなたを、骨の王座に座り、自分の従者の生肉で宴をするグールと呼んでいます…お許しください、陛下。この汚らわしい言葉を繰り返すだけで、病気になりそうです！」
languages.original_text: "He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"

traits.locale_text: 「奴はあなたを、骨の王座に座り、自分の従者の生肉で宴をするグールと呼んでいます…お許しください、陛下。この汚らわしい言葉を繰り返すだけで、病気になりそうです！」

languages.text: “他说您是个食尸鬼，坐在白骨堆成的王座上，吃着仆人的血肉……请原谅我，大人，光是重复这些污言秽语就让我感到恶心！”
languages.original_text: "He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"

traits.locale_text: “他说您是个食尸鬼，坐在白骨堆成的王座上，吃着仆人的血肉……请原谅我，大人，光是重复这些污言秽语就让我感到恶心！”

languages.text: « Il vous a {mf|accusé|accusée} d'être une goule assise sur un trône d'ossements, à se repaître de la chair et du sang de ses serviteurs... Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. Le seul fait de répéter ces insanités me rend malade ! »
languages.original_text: "He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"

traits.locale_text: « Il vous a {mf|accusé|accusée} d'être une goule assise sur un trône d'ossements, à se repaître de la chair et du sang de ses serviteurs... Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. Le seul fait de répéter ces insanités me rend malade ! »

languages.text: "Kemiklerden yapılma bir tahtta oturan bir gûl olduğunuzu, hizmetkârlarınızın etini çiğ çiğ yediğinizi söyledi. Beni affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu iğrenç sözleri tekrar etmek bile midemi bulandırıyor!"
languages.original_text: "He called you a ghoul who sits on a throne of bones, feasting on the raw flesh of {mf|his|her} servants... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Merely repeating these foul words is making me ill!"
